name: Harvest Moon DS: Grand Bazaar
description:
Harvest Moon DS: Grand Bazaar is an action game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Harvest Moon DS: Grand Bazaar is available on Nintendo DS.
It was produced by Yoshifumi Hashimoto. It was directed by Takahiro Yura. It was scored by Ayumu Murai, Eri Yasuda, Noriko Ishida and Shingo Kataoka.
